description: Truly Blue is a cocktail that is almost impossible to screw up if you want a&nbsp;tropical drink that's easy to make. This energizing beverage has a polarizing taste of sweetness and tartness with a luscious pineapple flavor. To achieve that&nbsp;blue hue, mix it with a little blue curacao.
name: Truly Blue
recipeIngredient: 5 cubes of Pineapple chunks and more for garnish
